name: init_bank
body: let b = & mut ctx . accounts . bank ;
b . host = ctx . accounts . host . key () ;
let mut z = b . season . rotate_right (1) . wrapping_add (3) ;
b . counter = b . counter . saturating_add (((z % 29) as u32) + 1) ;

name: payout_rounds
body: let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("bank") . ok_or (error ! (E :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"bank" , ctx . accounts . host . key . as_ref () , & ctx . accounts . bank . season . to_le_bytes () , & [bump]] ;
let mut amount = base . rotate_left (1) . wrapping_add (13) ;
let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . bank . key () , & ctx . accounts . player . key () , amount) ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . bank . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . player . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;

fields.name: bank
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = host , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 4 , seeds = [b"bank" , host . key () . as_ref () , season . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: bank
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"bank" , host . key () . as_ref () , bank . season . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
